attributes.action: Close down all inhumane & cruel slaughterhouses
attributes.additional_details: We need to put a stop to this, alot of farm animals like pigs are very intellegant, and are very aware of what is going on around them. We need to close these cruel methods down and enforce a more humane way of how we go about the killing of these animals.
attributes.background: Not everyone will become vegan, however we can put a stop to the cruel killing methods and torture alot of animals enjure when they go into a slaughterhouse. A lot of animals will still be alive while they are hung from the ceiling, battered, tortured and eventually have their throats slit.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what kinds of slaughter you'd like to be banned. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
